N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 346.5 - Bonds

State Regulations

The social services district shall make provision for
bonding all agents and employees of the district who must be bonded to meet

Federal requirements. A social services district may also obtain such
additional fiduciary bonding and bonding against theft as it determines
necessary in amounts and costs that are reasonable and prudent. All losses in
excess of the amount bonded against by the local district will not be
reimbursed. A copy of any bond obtained must be submitted to the department for
cost review. Notes
